column41: The allowance figure does not include any compensatory allowances paid to staff due to their overseas commitments.
From 1 April 2015 UKTI is separated from the FCO & BIS for reporting purposes. The allowance figure does not include any compensatory allowances paid to staff due to their overseas commitments.
